member.name: T:KerykeionCmsCore.Classes.KerykeionBaseClass
member.summary: Represents an abstract base class for Entity Framework purposes with a property 'Id' of type Guid to use as a primary key. And a property DateTimeCreated to remember the date and time of entity creation.
member.remarks: Every added entity to the DbContext should inherit from this class.

member.summary: Gets or sets the primary key for the entity named 'Id'.

member.summary: Gets the Unique Name Identifier for the Entity.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Name for the Entity.

member.summary: Represents all the options you can use to configure the KerykeionCms.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionCmsOptions.Pages
member.summary: Gets or sets the KerykeionCms.Options.KerykeionPageOptions for the KerykeionCms system.
member.value: The KerykeionCms.Options.KerykeionPageOptions for the KerykeionCms system.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionCmsOptions.User
member.summary: Gets or sets the KerykeionCms.Options.KerykeionUserOptions for the KerykeionCms system.
member.value: The KerykeionCms.Options.KerykeionUserOptions for the KerykeionCms system.

member.name: T:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionPageOptions
member.summary: Provides options for the KerykeionCms pages.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionPageOptions.IsRegisteringEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether it is possible for a user of the application to register.
member.value: Defaults to true. Set to false to disable users registering into the application.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionPageOptions.IsLoginInEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether it is possible for a user of the application to log in.
member.value: Defaults to true. Set to false to disable users loginin into the application.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionPageOptions.RequireAdministratorRoleToAccessCmsPages
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether it is required to be in an Administrator role in order to access Content Management Pages.
member.remarks: Should only be set to false in development environments.
member.value: Defaults to true. Set to false to enable anyone to access Content Management pages.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionPageOptions.Theme
member.summary: Gets or sets the theme for the KerykeionCms pages.
member.value: Defaults to Dark theme. There is also a Light theme.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionPageOptions.Language
member.summary: Gets or sets the language for the pages.
member.value: Defaults to English but there is also Dutch, German and French to choose from.

member.name: T:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionUserOptions
member.summary: Options for KerykeionUser validation.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionUserOptions.RequireProfileImage
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether a registering user requires a profile image.
member.value: True if the application requires each user to have a profile image, otherwise False.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.KerykeionUserOptions.CanUseExternalAuthenticationServices
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether a user can make use of external services to be authenticated (like google or facebook).
member.value: True if the application enables a user to authenticate via external services, False to disable.

member.summary: Represents the options to configure the SendEmailService.

member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the application to use as a sender for an email.

member.summary: Gets or sets the Smtp host port.

member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating wether to use ssl or not.

member.summary: Gets or sets the email address to be authenticated for the smtp host.

member.name: P:KerykeionCmsCore.Options.SendSmtpEmailOptions.AuthenticatedEmailAddressPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the password for the email address to be authenticated for the smtp host.

member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating wether the email sender is in fact configured. Defaults to False.
member.value: True if the email sender is configured, false if it's not.

member.summary: Lists all the entities specified by the table name.

The name of the table the entity resides in.
member.returns: The System.Threading.Tasks.Task that represents the asynchronous operation, containing the entity specified by the table name and the specified ID.

member.name: T:KerykeionCmsCore.Services.EmailService
member.summary: Provides API's to send and receive emails.

member.name: M:KerykeionCmsCore.Services.EmailService.SendEmailAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Call this function if you want to send an smtp email to one single user. Usefull in cases of email confirmation and password recovery.
member.param: The username of the receiver.
The email address of the receiver
The subject of the email
The message of the email
member.returns: The System.Threading.Tasks.Task that represents the asynchronous operation, containing the KerykeionCms.Services.SendEmailResult of the operation.
